content:
Students for Justice in Palestine will host  Nov PERIOD  to highlight Palestinian culture and the PalestinianIsraeli conflict PERIOD

A new OU student organization will host an event to bring awareness to the struggle for freedom Palestinians currently face PERIOD

Students for Justice in Palestine is presenting A Night in Palestine from  p.m PERIOD to  p.m PERIOD Nov PERIOD  in Traditions East Storm Shelter according to the events Facebook page PERIOD The evening will feature live Palestinian music free Arabic food and henna tattoos for students to enjoy according to the Facebook page PERIOD

While the focus of the organization is mainly political the event will also act as the organizations introduction to the student body by showcasing Palestines rich culture said Nazha Diwan chemical biosciences sophomore and Students for Justice in Palestine vice president PERIOD

This type of event is going to be mainly a showcase of Palestinian culture Palestinian food .. PERIOD to raise awareness of the PalestinianIsraeli question but at the same time introduce the rich Palestinian culture that people in North America in general often forget about Diwan said PERIOD

Students for Justice in Palestine was founded in  with the goal of informing students and raising awareness of the conflict occurring between Israel and Palestine according to the organizations Facebook page PERIOD

title: OU student group to address Palestinian conflict through event celebrating culture | News | oudaily.com
name: University of Oklahoma
